http://www.yansek.com/

Black Color Shirt Available in Small, Medium, Large, X-Large, XX-Large, and XXX-Large sizes.

name: CULT OF DIONYSIS "TRANSFIGURATION" CD (2014)
description: COMING SOON: TRANSFIGURATION Featuring the following tracks 1. Demise 2. Reign Of The Flame 3. Beyond The Fractured Fable 4. A Certain Kind Of Pain 5. Gravity & Destiny 6. Utopia Music and lyrics copyright 2014 Cult of Dionysis Created by the following lineup: Dionysis - Drums/Vocals James Huff - Bass/Lead Vocals Heath Hash - Lead and Rhythm Guitar Scott Mays - Rhythm Guitar Music by Dionysis, James Huff, Heath Hash, Scott Mays Lyrics by James Huff, Dionysis Produced by Derrick Acker & Cult of Dionysis

name: METALCULT COMIX SPECIAL #1 1ST PRINT
description:
Metalcult Comix Special #1 Spring 2013 issue, 1st Printing, 20 pages, written and illustrated by Dionysis with plot assist by Scott Mays & Larry Mays. NO ADS! TOTALLY UNDERGROUND! Cover to cover action with front and back covers by Don Rouse and Dionysis. The landmark debut special issue features the first sequential art appearance of THE SOLDIERS OF FORTUNE and stars Metalcult Guitarist Scott Mays aka RIFFOMAXIMUS!!! BUT WAIT...THERE'S MORE! Appearances by Kill Grrl, Dionysis, Huff, Adolf Hitler, Barack Obama, George W. Bush, Saddam Hussein, Osama Bin Ladin, Kim Jong Il + so much more!!! The book also features articles, full color photos, and a studio update about the band's new recording project. PICK UP YOUR COPY OF THIS FIRST ISSUE SPECIAL OF THE WORLD'S GREATEST HEAVY METAL COMIC BOOK FOR JUST 300 CENTS!!! Act now while supplies last, cuz this one's gonna sell out quick kiddies.

WARNING: Metalcult Comix is intended for mature audiences and contains adult content such as foul language, graphic violence, nudity, depictions of plant smoking, and several other deviant acts. Totally uncensored, parental discretion is advised.

name: METALCULT COMIX #4 1ST PRINT
description:
Metalcult Comix #4 Summer 2012 issue, 20 pages, written and illustrated by Dionysis, with additional artwork by Don Rouse, 1st Printing. 4th issue features the first sequential art appearance of the MECH-CANNIBALS & THE ENLIGHTENED ONE as Metronomicon, Riffomaximus, Thundrazoid, and Omegashredax escape the Zombie Earth only to be thrown into a fabled lost city of gold and their 2011 Regional Tour! Also, more background on the origins of KILL GRRL! Plus Omegashredax must decide whether he'll stay with the Metalcult or return home, what will he choose? Find out in this issue! Includes FREE Cult of Dionysis OUIJA BOARD! The book also includes cameos by BLACKLIST, METAL MAIDEN of WV METAL + metal legends MARK ALEXANDER, PETER WICHERS, WOODY WEATHERMAN, and photos of fans with Metalcult Comix! 

WARNING: Metalcult Comix is intended for mature audiences and contains adult content such as foul language, nudity, depictions of plant smoking, and several other deviant acts. Totally uncensored, parental discretion is advised.

name: METALCULT COMIX #2 2ND PRINT
description:
Metalcult Comix #2 Summer 2011 issue, SECOND PRINTING, 32 pages, written and illustrated by Dionysis, with additional artwork by Don Rouse. 2nd issue features the first sequential art appearance of RIFFOMAXIMUS, METALICLOPS, SNARLOWRATH! How will Thundrazoid and Metronomicon keep the band together when members bail? Plus, find out what the Metalcult does when they are attacked by a badass bald headed axe grinder known as Riffomaximus! But wait...there's more! Also, the Metalcult vs Mighty Metaliclops in a chapter of the series that can only be called "Metal's Greatest Superhero Battles". Also features articles and a 2011 regional tour date listing + photo collage. 

WARNING: Metalcult Comix is intended for mature audiences and contains adult content such as foul language, nudity, depictions of plant smoking, and several other deviant acts. Totally uncensored, parental discretion is advised.
